title: 【破事水】大家喜欢用什么软件听歌？
author: Mike_Play_OK
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mike_Play_OK 于 2019-5-18 19:59 编辑 
Netease云音乐应该是大家最常用的听歌软件之一了。
那么大佬们是用Netease听歌还是其他软件听歌呢？

replies.author: zjxx
replies.txt_content: 强推一波osu!(大雾

replies.author: mc3124076548
replies.txt_content: 我觉得这差距已经很明显了

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content: 那如果不听音乐呢？

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 网易云音乐肯定是最好的拉

replies.author: Hueihuea
replies.txt_content: 网易啥都搞不好 就网易云音乐NB

replies.author: Mike_Play_OK
replies.txt_content:
CZHMC 发表于 2019-5-18 19:42
那如果不听音乐呢？那就不选呗……

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 为什么没有其它主流软件的选项？

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 浏览器，播放B站音乐（gui chu）区视频

replies.author: pdx233
replies.txt_content: 网易云挺好的

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 我是网a易云音乐+酷狗

replies.author: 柿子shizi
replies.txt_content: 感觉酷狗和网易云都不错的

replies.author: ItsZeroHikari
replies.txt_content:
zjxx 发表于 2019-5-18 19:41
强推一波osu!(大雾
惊了，全坛大佬都玩osu

强推MuseDash，不接受反驳#大雾

replies.author: 毅毅最酷
replies.txt_content: 习惯了QQ 然我用网易了哈哈

replies.author: TenmaW
replies.txt_content: 网易云音乐，你为啥要把投票设置这么久，一天就差不多了233

replies.author: roj234
replies.txt_content: 浏览器!

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
这个问题的帖子我见过5次了
我 用 天 天 动 听

replies.author: 忍劫丶绝迹
replies.txt_content: 网易云呀，用了很久啦

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content: 酷狗路过XD  其他软件版权限制过于严重awsl

replies.author: FengSUGou
replies.txt_content: 网易云音乐

replies.author: orfg
replies.txt_content: 我最喜欢用网易云音乐
扣扣音乐

replies.author: wwooww
replies.txt_content: 一直用酷狗

replies.author: MashKJo
replies.txt_content: 一直用Groove

replies.author: fxxza
replies.txt_content: 酷我音乐= =
当然是自己唱或者听别人唱啦......开个玩笑。用最多的是酷狗或者是windows自带的，有些是从网易上听。

replies.author: ⑨
replies.txt_content: 我当时用Windows 10 Mobile手机的时候用的是网易云和Groove音乐 现在手机被我刷成Windows10arm单系统了就用网易云了啥？为啥当时不用网易云  从网易云下载下来用Groove听省电啊

replies.author: Mr.阿冬
replies.txt_content: 肯定是网易云音乐和酷狗音乐，各有各的好处，比如网易云音乐的评论就赋有哲理，酷狗音乐的歌多

replies.author: 会跑的房子
replies.txt_content: 网上下载下来放到 Foobar2000听音乐

replies.author: MC_earth
replies.txt_content: 酷狗  QQ  音乐

replies.author: 零的夜故事
replies.txt_content: 网易云yeh

replies.author: My222
replies.txt_content: 一直在用网易云emn

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 我觉得网易云音乐比较全，所以就用网易云咯！

replies.author: 唯风见影
replies.txt_content: QQ音乐  一个星期 听了4000分钟

replies.author: fcukdoing
replies.txt_content: 看似 酷我跟酷狗占据少人.....

replies.author: dpy0428
replies.txt_content: 以前用QQ音乐，现在用网易云音乐，wyyyy

replies.author: aaaaawed
replies.txt_content: 肯定是网易云啊，云村多好

replies.author: z49777883
replies.txt_content: 网易云+1，我一直在用网易云

replies.author: 心念の冰
replies.txt_content: 网易云 +1

replies.author: 无心人书屋
replies.txt_content:
为啥要听歌！听了又不会唱！唱了又不好听！

说笑呢，别在意，网易云+1

replies.author: Tian_RanDou
replies.txt_content: 网易云牛批

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 表示喜欢网易云

replies.author: z6z6z6
replies.txt_content: 抱歉不听歌

replies.author: Rilet
replies.txt_content: 我用网易云哒
